name: GetEnterpriseUsers
description:
Fetch users from a Trello enterprise.

Retrieve the users of a specified Trello enterprise, including licensed members and board guests. The response is paginated, returning 100 users per call.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: ID of the Trello enterprise to retrieve users from.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: active_since_date
parameters.description: Filter users active since this date (inclusive). Use YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: active_date_filter
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive). Provide the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: String to search for members by email or full name starting with this value.

value_schema.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor value to fetch the next set of user results. Use the cursor received from a previous response to continue fetching more users.

value_schema.description: Cursor to return next set of results, use cursor returned in the response to query the next batch.

parameters.name: licensed_members_only
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve only members with a license for the Trello Enterprise; false for only unlicensed members. Leave unspecified to include both licensed and unlicensed members.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who possess a license for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who do not. If unspecified, both licensed and unlicensed members will be returned.

parameters.name: fetch_deactivated_members
parameters.description: When true, returns members who have been deactivated; when false, returns members who have not. Both active and deactivated members are returned if unspecified.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who have been deactivated for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who have not. If unspecified, both active and deactivated members will be returned.

parameters.name: return_board_guests
parameters.description: Set to true to return members who are guests on boards; false to return only non-guests. If not set, both are included.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are guests on one or more boards in the corresponding Trello Enterprise (but do not possess a license); when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both guests and non-guests will be returned.

parameters.name: return_managed_members_only
parameters.description: Specify true to return only managed members, false for only unmanaged, or omit for both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are managed by the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both managed and unmanaged members will be returned.

parameters.name: only_admin_members
parameters.description: Set to True to return only administrators of the Trello Enterprise. If False, return non-admins. Unspecified returns both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are administrators of the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both admin and non-admin members will be returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.description: When true, returns members who possess a license for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who do not. If unspecified, both licensed and unlicensed members will be returned.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who have been deactivated for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who have not. If unspecified, both active and deactivated members will be returned.

parameters.description: When true, returns members who are guests on one or more boards in the corresponding Trello Enterprise (but do not possess a license); when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both guests and non-guests will be returned.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are guests on one or more boards in the corresponding Trello Enterprise (but do not possess a license); when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both guests and non-guests will be returned.

parameters.description: When true, returns members who are managed by the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both managed and unmanaged members will be returned.

parameters.description: When true, returns members who are administrators of the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both admin and non-admin members will be returned.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are administrators of the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both admin and non-admin members will be returned.

parameters.name: activeSince
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: inactiveSince
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

value_schema.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor to return next set of results, use cursor returned in the response to query the next batch.

value_schema.description: Cursor to return next set of results, use cursor returned in the response to query the next batch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.
